item.description:
GOLF 101 for New Golfers and GOLF 102 Tournament Playing Lessons provides low-cost Professional Golfing Lessons

Discount Golf Lessons ( www.DiscountGolfCT.com  ) starts the fourth year with the GOLF 101 and GOLF 102 series – which has already had over 400 graduates in the first 3 years!

Why is GOLF 101 so popular? The answer is simple – GOLF 101 gives you 6 hours of high quality hand-on golfing instruction in a small class size for only $100 – which includes clubs and all fees and equipment. Compare Golf 101 at less than $17 per hour to lessons from a Golf Pro that can cost you $50 - $80 per hour – and the answer is obvious. The flexible schedule lets you choose any 3 lesson dates and times to accommodate the busiest golfer.

Students can mix and match any date to customize their schedule. Golf 101 lessons are $150 at the golf course if any spaces remain, the discounted price of $100 is available online only.

After you purchase your spot in GOLF 101 or GOLF 102, you will be emailed all the available date for you to choose your 3 lesson dates, and then you are emailed a confirmation and some Golf Lesson information .

GOLF 101 is designed for both the New Golfer who wants to improve their golf game, and anyone who is picking up the golf club for the first time – and wants to try the competitive and challenging game of golf without having to make large cash investment in clubs and lessons. You are taught putting, chipping, rules, etiquette, and plenty of work at the driving range. Video Swing Analysis is included to help you perfect this game of champions.

GOLF 102 takes you out on the golf course for playing lessons as you play on a team Scramble Tournament style – to give you experience and help you play better than your buddies – and be the hero at your Company Golf Tournament!

So how does the GOLF 101 and GOLF 102 Certified Teaching Professional George Claffey stack up against those expensive Golfing Pros? In 2010, George Claffey was recognized By The United States Golf Teachers Federation as one of the top 100 Certified Golf Teaching Professional in the WORLD – the ONLY Instructor to be awarded this honor in Connecticut!

It just does not get any better than that!

Lesson are held at:
Miner Hills Golf Course and Driving Range
80 Miner Hills Dr
Middletown, CT 06457 

Exit 20 off 91 (Country Club Road Exit)

10 Minutes From Hartford * 10 Minutes from New Haven


*** Classes Fill Up Quickly – Reserve your Golf 101 and Golf 102 lessons before class space is filled ***

GOLF 101:

Sundays -3:30pm to 5:30pm (held every Sunday)

Wednesdays  -5:30pm to 7:30pm (held every Wednesday)

 

GOLF 102

Mondays –5:30pm to 7:30pm, Golf until dark for FREE (held every Monday)

Reserve your spot in GOLF 101 and GOLF 102

Visit www.DiscountGolfCT.com   or call (860) 436-9449
item.how_to_find_us: GOLF 101 meets at the clubhouse, our Instructor will be wearing a white www.CTGolfTips.com hat
